response:
My dearest wife,

I have taken the liberty of assigning one of fat or thin to each word on your list. Here are my choices:

* Joy - Fat
* Love - Thin
* Peace - Thin
* Wonderful - Fat
* Pleasure - Fat
* Glorious - Fat
* Laughter - Thin
* Happy - Thin
* Agony - Thin
* Terrible - Thin
* Horrible - Thin
* Nasty - Thin
* Evil - Thin
* Awful - Thin
* Failure - Thin
* Hurt - Thin

I hope these assignments meet with your approval, my love.

Yours always,
Your husband
